name: Twigin
description:
FOLLOW MY TWITTER FOR UPDATES AND WHEN THE FULL GAME DROPS!

Twigin is an open world 3D RTS Game about collecting treasures and slaying beasts to save trapped Twigin and grow your army to get more treasure! But be careful, The creatures of the mania dimension won’t make it easy! You’ll have to camp out surviving the elements and research the behaviour of your enemies to gain the most effective strategies! 
The Twigin are there to help you out any day, but are you fit to lead the way?

On your first play through of an area it may be burning hot but the next time it’s flooded! You may find different enemies that spawn overtime, and even treasures that weren’t there before!

This is only an early Alpha, with only one area. Models, Areas, Gameplay, UI, Music, Sound, almost everything will change in the final game. There will be more areas with new themes, enemies, and more. So please, if this Alpha isn’t what you expected or hoped for, Give it another chance when the full game is out.
